name: Little Robot Toy
description:
Try to escape of a bedroom as a little robot toy. you will encounter many obstacles in your adventure like other toys.

IMPORTANT : the keys

Keyboard or MouseControllerMove forwardZQSD/WASDleft stickJumpSpaceARollAltXAimRight clickL1/2ShootLeft clickR1/2QuitEscapeStartToggle fullscreenFSelectToggle mouseCtrl
